bug.author: justrohan
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: I am running a microk8s cluster on a ubuntu machine and am trying to deploy kubeflow using the Multi-user, auth-enabled Kubeflow with kfctl_existing_arrikto method mentioned and I was following the steps, but ran into an error when trying out kfctl apply all command. On running kfctl apply all -V This is what I get: INFO[0000] Downloading /home/rvaikkath/kf-poc/app.yaml to /tmp/421350265/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:334" INFO[0000] Writing stripped KfDef to /home/rvaikkath/kf-poc/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:626" INFO[0000] Downloading /home/rvaikkath/kf-poc/app.yaml to /tmp/753186948/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:334" WARN[0000] could not open /root/.kube/config Error stat /root/.kube/config: no such file or directory filename="apps/group.go:234" Error: couldn't apply KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: coordinator Apply failed for existing_arrikto: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: must provide non-nil rest.Config to client.New github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/v2/pkg/kfapp/existing_arrikto.(*Existing).Apply /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/v2/pkg/kfapp/existing_arrikto/existing.go:118 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator.(*coordinator).Apply.func1 /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator/coordinator.go:724 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator.(*coordinator).Apply /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator/coordinator.go:775 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd.glob..func1 /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd/apply.go:46 github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute /home/jlewi/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.3/command.go:762 github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC /home/jlewi/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.3/command.go:852 github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute /home/jlewi/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.3/command.go:800 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd.Execute /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd/root.go:61 main.main /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/main.go:36 runtime.main /usr/local/go/src/runtime/proc.go:200 runtime.goexit /usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1337 Usage: kfctl apply [all(=default)|k8s|platform] [flags] Flags: -h, --help help for apply -V, --verbose verbose output default is false couldn't apply KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: coordinator Apply failed for existing_arrikto: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: must provide non-nil rest.Config to client.New github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/v2/pkg/kfapp/existing_arrikto.(*Existing).Apply /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/v2/pkg/kfapp/existing_arrikto/existing.go:118 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator.(*coordinator).Apply.func1 /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator/coordinator.go:724 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator.(*coordinator).Apply /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/coordinator/coordinator.go:775 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd.glob..func1 /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd/apply.go:46 github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute /home/jlewi/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.3/command.go:762 github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC /home/jlewi/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.3/command.go:852 github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute /home/jlewi/go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.3/command.go:800 github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd.Execute /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd/root.go:61 main.main /home/jlewi/git_kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/main.go:36 runtime.main /usr/local/go/src/runtime/proc.go:200 runtime.goexit /usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1337 I ran kfctl generate all -V which produced: INFO[0000] Downloading /home/rvaikkath/kf-poc/app.yaml to /tmp/252739953/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:334" INFO[0000] Writing stripped KfDef to /home/rvaikkath/kf-poc/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:626" INFO[0000] Downloading /home/rvaikkath/kf-poc/app.yaml to /tmp/937528348/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:334" INFO[0000] Initializing kustomize package map filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:150" INFO[0000] Component path map: {} filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:171" INFO[0000] Writing stripped KfDef to /home/rvaikkath/kf-poc/app.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:626" INFO[0000] Processing application: application-crds filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: application filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: metacontroller filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: argo filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: centraldashboard filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: webhook filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: bootstrap filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: jupyter-web-app filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: katib-db filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: katib-manager filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: katib-controller filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: katib-ui filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: metadata filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: metrics-collector filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: suggestion filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: notebook-controller filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: pytorch-job-crds filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: pytorch-operator filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: spartakus filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: tensorboard filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: tf-job-operator filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: api-service filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: minio filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: mysql filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: persistent-agent filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: pipelines-runner filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: pipelines-ui filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: pipelines-viewer filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: scheduledworkflow filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: profiles filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" INFO[0000] Processing application: seldon-core-operator filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:606" get all namespaces info if needed: default service/nginx LoadBalancer 10.152.183.84 10.152.183.1 80:31852/TCP istio-system service/istio-ingressgateway LoadBalancer 10.152.183.203 10.152.183.0 15020:30378/TCP,80:31380/TCP,443:31390/TCP,31400:31400/TCP,15029:30085/TCP,15030:31165/TCP,15031:30160/TCP,15032:32250/TCP,15443:32324/TCP 25m What did you expect to happen: I expected kfctl apply all to execute without any problem. Anything else you would like to add: I have metal LB configured. Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard):
kfctl version: kfctl v0.6.2-0-g47a0e4c7
Kubernetes platform: microk8s
Kubernetes version: Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"16", GitVersion:"v1.16.0", GitCommit:"2bd9643cee5b3b3a5ecbd3af49d09018f0773c77", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-09-18T14:36:53Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.9", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

OS: Ubuntu 18.04

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 1.00. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
I got this same problem while installing Multi-user, auth-enabled Kubeflow with kfctl_existing_arrikto on kubernetes version 1.15.4 solved it by running kfctl as non-root
We just released 0.7.0 which fixes a lot of bugs. Please try it out and if your still having problems open a new issue.
I used version 0.70, it went smoothly and I didn't experience theses errors again. Thank You!
